New Records: Corey Seager hit the hardest-hit World Series homer in the Statcast era, with a speed of 114.5 mph
Key Match Events: Corey Seager made a sliding stop and started a double play in the eighth inning that might have saved the game
Geraldo Perdomo followed with an RBI single, making it 3-1
Corey Seager started a clutch double play, sliding on his knees to field a hot smash from Ketel Marte before flipping to Semien, who relayed to first
Pre-Game Insights: The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
The Rangers are the first team in major league history to win their first nine road games in one postseason
Post-Match Reflections: Corey Seager said 'This is what you play for. This is where you want to be at this moment'
Marcus Semien said 'It's tough. We're a deep group. We'll see what happens with both of those guys'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams combined for no errors over the first two games of the series
The Rangers produced more defensive highlights that helped them take control of Game 3
Texas is 9-0 this postseason when scoring first
